how does hibernate work under linux with: Just like on any other machine, just check which modes your chipset supports under Ubuntu
you can always try to go into sleep mode..(After you close all your files) If it doesn't wake up from that, you'll know it wont support it. It will start after the second time of rebooting though
It sounds a bit simple, I know, but it's the fastest way to test it.  You can also google for your chipset and acpi / apm
